raw_text: The relatively high efficiency rate, as compared with the figures reported in (Brent, 1991), are due to the fact that Italian morphology is far more complex than English
clean_text: The relatively high efficiency rate, as compared with the figures reported in (Brent, 1991), are due to the fact that Italian morphology is far more complex than English.

citing_paper_authors: Roberto, Basili | Maria Teresa, Pazienza | Paola, Velardi
raw_text: Once a good morphologic analyzer is available (the one used in our work is very well tested, and has first described in (Russo,1987)), problems such as verb detection, raised in (Brent, 1991), are negligible
clean_text: Once a good morphologic analyzer is available (the one used in our work is very well tested, and has first described in (Russo, 1987)), problems such as verb detection, raised in (Brent, 1991), are negligible.

citing_paper_authors: Xiwu, Han | Tiejun, Zhao | Haoliang, Qi | Hao, Yu
raw_text: Since (Brent 1991) there have been a considerable amount of researches focusing on verb lexicons with respective sub categorization information specified both in the field of traditional linguistics and that of computational linguistics
clean_text: Since (Brent 1991) there have been a considerable amount of researches focusing on verb lexicons with respective sub categorization information specified both in the field of traditional linguistics and that of computational linguistics.

raw_text: Finally, while statistical approaches like Brent (1991) can gather e.g. valence information from large corpora, we are more interested in full grammatical processing of individual sentences to maximally exploit each context
clean_text: Finally, while statistical approaches like Brent (1991) can gather e.g. valence information from large corpora, we are more interested in full grammatical processing of individual sentences to maximally exploit each context.
